mapper.sql: select id, pwd , name, email, tel , mphoto, zipcode, address , gender, age, mevent, introduce
mapper.select:
from Member order by
id email
name
asc desc
limit #{startIndex}, #{length}
mapper.insert: insert into member( id, pwd , name, email, tel , mphoto, zipcode, address , gender, age, mevent, introduce ) values(#{id},sha1(#{password}),#{name},#{email},#{tel},#{mphoto},#{zipcode},#{address},#{gender},#{age},#{mevent},#{introduce})
mapper.select: from member where email=#{email} and pwd=sha1(#{password})
